name: the_selling_partner_api_for_sellers
description: The [Selling Partner API for Sellers](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/sellers-api-v1-reference) (Sellers API) provides essential information about seller accounts, such as:  - The marketplaces a seller can list in - The default language and currency of a marketplace - Whether the seller has suspended listings  Refer to the [Sellers API reference](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/sellers-api-v1-reference) for details about this API's operations, data types, and schemas.
